summary: Complete testing of admin database page (/admin/database) and new admin role features. All 4 tabs (Utilisateurs, Articles, Annonces, Paiements) functional. Admin-only access control verified. CSV exports working. Immobilier hero icon successfully removed.

backend_admin_endpoints: GET /api/admin/stats - Returns correct counts (users, articles, properties, payments)
GET /api/admin/users - Paginated users list with search and role filters
DELETE /api/admin/users/{id} - Delete user and related data
GET /api/admin/articles - Paginated articles with category filter
GET /api/admin/properties - Paginated properties with type/status filters
GET /api/admin/payments - Paginated payments with status/method filters
admin_access_control: Non-admin users (role=visiteur) get 403 on all admin endpoints
Auteur role also gets 403 (only admin role allowed)
Admin cannot modify/delete their own account
Frontend AdminRoute redirects non-admin users to homepage
frontend_database_page: /admin/database page loads correctly for admin users
4 stat cards show correct totals (Utilisateurs, Articles, Annonces, Paiements)
4 tabs working: UTILISATEURS, ARTICLES, ANNONCES, PAIEMENTS
Users tab: role badges (VISITEUR, AGENT, ADMIN), status badges, search, filter, CSV export
Articles tab: category badges, views count, edit/view/delete actions
Annonces tab: type badges (VENTE), status dropdowns, price, city, actions
Paiements tab: reference codes, amounts in GNF/$US, payment methods, status dropdowns
Header dropdown for admin shows 'Base de données' link
immobilier_hero: Immobilier page hero section has orange vertical bar
No logo/icon image in hero section - icon successfully removed

seed_data_creation: Test users created during testing (TEST_SuspendUser, TEST_RoleChange, TEST_NonAdminUI2)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin database page fully functional. User admin@example.com has role='admin' and can access /admin/database. All CRUD operations and CSV exports verified. Immobilier hero section no longer has logo icon.
